title: Remove Home page hero headline block

requirements.text: Remove the Home page hero headline block that displays the text "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" from the hero section on the landing page (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx), while keeping the rest of the hero content (the "AI-Powered App Builder" label, supporting paragraph, and CTA buttons) intact and visually balanced.

quotes: Remove ,SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY,  block

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page hero section, the text "SIDEHUSL AI, BUILD YOUR SIDE HUSTLE TODAY!" is not rendered anywhere.
The hero section still displays the "AI-Powered App Builder" label, the supporting paragraph, and both CTA buttons, without awkward extra spacing where the headline used to be.
No other pages or global navigation elements are changed.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change the hero background image, overlay gradients, or CTA button routes (/builder and /browse).
Do not alter backend behavior or data models.
